Author: rchambers
Title: Media Jobs Site Mediabistro Sold To Jupitermedia For $23 Million
Content: After a long auction process and going through multiple suitors, almost giving up on the process, and coming close to selling to at least one of them, the media jobs, events and info site Mediabistro has been sold to Jupitermedia for $23 million--$20 million is in cash and an additional $3 million over two years.
